entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries and then to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Snow level rising to 1300 metres in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
